EmailTemplate.name: Email Template when BSD Pricing is Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.Quote_Number__c} has been rejected by BSD Pricing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.OwnerFullName} ,
This Email is to notify you that your Quote has been rejected by BSD Pricing Team.Please review the notes below for reasons/next steps.
Thank you, Best regards, Office Depot BSD Pricing
